arStrings.szText:
Gain the {c_important}Flame Shield Enchantment{/c} for free. 

When {c_important}Flame Shield{/c} activates, {c_important}Meteorites{/c} fall around you dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage.

Gain the {c_important}Flame Shield Enchantment{/c} for free. When {c_important}Flame Shield{/c} activates, {c_important}Meteorites{/c} fall around you dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage.
